page.shortlink: UX Control Field Properties Default value
page.description: Specify the default value for the control.

description.p: The default value can be a value, an expression (start expression with an = sign), a session variable (e.g. =session.name), a page variable (e.g. =pageVariable.name), or an argument (e.g. =:arg1).
If the control is a dropdownbox, radio button, or checkbox, you must set the stored value, not he display value.
If the control is a two-value 'slider', the default value is of the form *[xb:value1..value2]*.

If the control is multi-valued (e.g. checkbox, list configured as multi-select, etc.), you can use special array() syntax. For example: *[xb:array(red,green)]*. Alternatively, you can enter an expression as a CR-LF delimited list: *[xb:="red"+crlf()+"green"]*.

section.note: For numeric fields, numbers must be entered with a period for the decimal separator, regardless of the regional settings on the machine when the server is running.
